0109ab47-c14e-41cc-9872-a3e7d7ee0713.name: 战斗反射
0109ab47-c14e-41cc-9872-a3e7d7ee0713.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

7491efc6-522e-41c4-baba-1eb651344b02.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）
7491efc6-522e-41c4-baba-1eb651344b02.notes: Gives +1 bonus to Parry with @Melee weapon skill@ (add manually)

7b896a3f-a3eb-4b0a-a6f1-1b8937886f11.name: 健康
7b896a3f-a3eb-4b0a-a6f1-1b8937886f11.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

fc1c11bb-c766-49c8-a91d-26bd2ae6866a.name: Fit, Very
fc1c11bb-c766-49c8-a91d-26bd2ae6866a.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

f29a2f77-4e57-4034-8f60-e97e768780be.name: 难以杀死
f29a2f77-4e57-4034-8f60-e97e768780be.notes: +1/level to HT rolls made for survival at -HP or below, and on any HT roll where failure means instant death (due to heart failure, poison, etc.). If this bonus makes the difference between success and failure, you collapse, apparently dead (or disabled), but come to in the usual amount of time. A successful Diagnosis roll reveals the truth.

1ca36f71-f386-44d6-89a8-d886b6f41a2f.name: 难以击溃
1ca36f71-f386-44d6-89a8-d886b6f41a2f.notes: +1/level to any HT roll to avoid unconsciousness – whether as a result of injury, drugs, or ultra-tech weapons – and to resist supernatural abilities that cause unconsciousness

5e3f1b31-249e-41f8-b557-4f576ad2fb0d.name: 幸运
5e3f1b31-249e-41f8-b557-4f576ad2fb0d.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

87fff7a7-9e15-428a-8762-ce9d1a2c3b0d.name: Luck, Extraordinary
87fff7a7-9e15-428a-8762-ce9d1a2c3b0d.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

249d519c-ff38-4268-93e9-b1c090e7d518.name: 标志性装备
249d519c-ff38-4268-93e9-b1c090e7d518.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

29b4c006-ee0a-441d-ab91-5f421875d38e.name: 《了解你自己的力量》价格变体

7f159798-20c3-403f-bb07-59035519c3c9.name: 冷酷无情
7f159798-20c3-403f-bb07-59035519c3c9.notes: +1 to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

features.situation: 来自过去的受害者以及任何具有共情的角色

441c032a-88d0-4f08-9122-51b7ec3f63f1.name: 执念
441c032a-88d0-4f08-9122-51b7ec3f63f1.notes: Choose a type of monster to slay

07e8880e-a551-43f8-be6c-4b764ca1841c.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)
